text: Francesco Locatelli (9 March 1920 - 12 December 1978) was an Italian racing cyclist. He won the 1949 edition of the Tour de Pologne. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:1978 deaths Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:People from the Province of Lecco
title: Francesco Locatelli
